items.content_html: "easy-api-encryptor" is a lightweight NPM package facilitating seamless encryption and decryption of data between Node.js and React.js. Ensure secure communication in your applications with minimal setup, making it easy to protect sensitive information during transit.
items.title: NayakPenguin/easy-api-encryptor: "easy-api-encryptor" is a lightweight NPM package facilitating seamless encryption and decryption of data between Node.js and React.js. Ensure secure communication in your applications with minimal setup, making it easy to protect sensitive information during transit.

items.content_html: Track expenses effortlessly with zer0 - an open-source, lightweight app. No servers, no cloud - your data stays on your device using MongoDB Realm. Choose themes, manage categories, and sync seamlessly. Features: account creation, expense tracking, category modification, insightful analytics, debt tracking, and robust settings for ultimate privacy.
items.title: indranilbhuin/zero: Track expenses effortlessly with zer0 - an open-source, lightweight app. No servers, no cloud - your data stays on your device using MongoDB Realm. Choose themes, manage categories, and sync seamlessly. Features: account creation, expense tracking, category modification, insightful analytics, debt tracking, and robust settings for ultimate privacy.

items.content_html: "VfyJS is a sophisticated JavaScript library crafted to fortify projects. Its lightweight design offers a comprehensive solution for seamless value validation, ensuring data integrity and empowering developers with an advanced platform to effortlessly address diverse validation tasks in their projects."
